name: Malicious Fallen
description:
When the forces of ultimate evil are unleashed on the world, only the Spirit Vessel can hope to subdue them. Malicious Fallen includes the complete story so far and adds two brand new chapters, “Pursuit” and “Demise.” Experience the thrilling finale of the Malicious saga, remastered, enhanced and expanded for the PlayStation®4 system.
• Battle waves of minions and face off against colossal bosses in thrilling brawler combat.
• Master the Mantle of Cinders – a powerful shapeshifting weapon to devastate your foes.
• Build your arsenal – acquire new abilities to customize your play style and prepare for the final showdown.
